Purchase Mining Vessel.Name: Purchase Mining Vessel
Purchase Mining Vessel.Description: Invest in a mining vessel equiped with a reactor to start generating power for your galactic mining endevors.

Turn On Reactor.Name: Turn On Reactor
Turn On Reactor.Description: Generates power so we can research and deploy new mining assets.

Deploy Mining Laser.Name: Deploy Mining Laser
Deploy Mining Laser.Description: Collects credits by firing a burst of energy from orbit.

Construct Hangar.Name: Construct Hangar
Construct Hangar.Description: Build the mining drone hanger to send down unmanned craft to gather credits from the surface.

Construct Surface Mining Barge.Name: Construct Surface Mining Barge
Construct Surface Mining Barge.Description: A mobile mining barge that mines credits while it moves.

Construct Quake Mines Factory.Name: Construct Quake Mines Factory
Construct Quake Mines Factory.Description: A factory that builds and drops earthquake causing mines fracturing large areas releasing credits.

Construct Gravity Cannon.Name: Construct Gravity Cannon
Construct Gravity Cannon.Description: A cannon that harnesses the raw power of gravity and focusing it into a condensed credit generating beam.

Reactor Mk2.Name: Reactor Mk2
Reactor Mk2.Description: An upgraded reactor that has more flux capacitors, increasing power yield.

Extra Reactor.Name: Reactor Mk2
Extra Reactor.Description: Install an extra reactor, increasing power yield speed.

Mining Laser Mk2.Name: Mining Laser Mk2
Mining Laser Mk2.Description: An upgraded mining laser that fires a more concentrated beam, increasing credit yield.

Extra Mining Laser.Name: Extra Mining Laser
Extra Mining Laser.Description: Install an extra mining laser, increasing credit yield speed.

Mining Drone Mk2.Name: Mining Drone Mk2
Mining Drone Mk2.Description: An upgraded mining drone that has larger cargo holds, increasing credit yield.

Extra Mining Drone.Name: Extra Mining Drone
Extra Mining Drone.Description: Add an extra mining drone to the hanger, increasing credit yield speed.

Surface Mining Barge Mk2.Name: Surface Mining Barge Mk2
Surface Mining Barge Mk2.Description: An upgraded surface mining barge that has enhanced drills, increasing credit yield.
Prerequisites: Develop Surface Mining Barge Mk2 Schematic

Extra Surface Mining Barge.Name: Extra Surface Mining Barge
Extra Surface Mining Barge.Description: Add an extra surface mining barge, increasing credit yield speed.
Prerequisites: Develop Surface Mining Barge Mk2 Schematic

Quake Mines Mk2.Name: Quake Mines Mk2
Quake Mines Mk2.Description: An upgraded quake mine that has a larger explosive yield, increasing credit yield.

Extra Quake Mines Factory.Name: Extra Quake Mines Factory
Extra Quake Mines Factory.Description: Add an extra quake mines factory, increasing credit yield speed.

Gravity Cannon Mk2.Name: Gravity Cannon Mk2
Gravity Cannon Mk2.Description: An upgraded gravity cannon that focuses gravity more efficiently, increasing credit yield.

Extra Gravity Cannon.Name: Extra Gravity Cannon
Extra Gravity Cannon.Description: Install an extra gravity cannon, increasing credit yield speed.
